properties.Name: CustomerDocument
properties.Description:
A document associated with the customer.

It is important to know what documentation is available related to customers, orders, service etc. as well as the location of that information.     

Information is a corporate asset when used properly and available for use by the widest appropriate numbers of users.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: DocumentId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Document.

Columns.Name: CustomerDocumentNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the Customer Document.
